entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story who is paralyzed and staring in terror.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of people who seem to have won a fight below.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A calm and welcoming person who is being cornered by the Death Eaters.

entities.name: amykus
entities.description: A lumpy-looking man with a lopsided leer who is one of the Death Eaters.

entities.name: alecto
entities.description: A stocky little woman who looks like she could be Amycus's sister and is grinning eagerly.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Someone who has done something well according to the lumpy-looking man.

relationships.description: Amycus and Alecto seem to be related, possibly as siblings.
Dumbledore is being cornered by Amycus and the Death Eaters.
Draco has done something well according to Amycus, who gives him an accolade.
Dumbledore is also being held by Alecto.
